memberdef.name: NDPluginProcessSaveBackgroundString
memberdef.initializer: "SAVE_BACKGROUND" /* (asynInt32, r/w) Save the current frame as background */

memberdef.name: NDPluginProcessValidBackgroundString
memberdef.initializer: "VALID_BACKGROUND" /* (asynInt32, r/o) Is there a valid background */

memberdef.name: NDPluginProcessSaveFlatFieldString
memberdef.initializer: "SAVE_FLAT_FIELD" /* (asynInt32, r/w) Save the current frame as flat field */

memberdef.name: NDPluginProcessValidFlatFieldString
memberdef.initializer: "VALID_FLAT_FIELD" /* (asynInt32, r/o) Is there a valid flat field */

memberdef.name: NDPluginProcessScaleFlatFieldString
memberdef.initializer: "SCALE_FLAT_FIELD" /* (asynInt32, r/o) Scale factor after dividing by flat field */

memberdef.name: NDPluginProcessAutoOffsetScaleString
memberdef.initializer: "AUTO_OFFSET_SCALE" /* (asynInt32, r/w) Oneshot calc of scale and offset value from min and max values */

memberdef.name: NDPluginProcessFilterCallbacksString
memberdef.initializer: "FILTER_CALLBACKS" /* (asynInt32, r/w) Only do callbacks on N */

memberdef.name: NDPluginProcessNumFilterString
memberdef.initializer: "NUM_FILTER" /* (asynInt32, r/w) Number of frames to filter */
